masterFinding.verificationInstructions:
Verification Instructions

Determine how the application implements captchas. Implementation weaknesses can include:
  • static CAPTCHA value

  • valid CAPTCHA value in server response


Reporting Requirements
  1. Add an explanation how CAPTCHAs are implemented and how the implementation can be bypassed

  2. Add screenshot showing CAPTCHA validation bypass
masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Ensure that the CAPTCHA value is verified prior to processing other form data.
masterFinding.name: CAPTCHA - Application Logic Error
masterFinding.businessImpact: The protections against automated attacks that the CAPTCHA provides may be circumvented.
masterFinding.description: CAPTCHAs are intended to prevent the automated submission of forms and enumeration of data. The application requires users to enter a CAPTCHA value on multiple forms, but it is possible to bypass the CAPTCHA requirement due to application weaknesses.
